overview:
Chris Hunter continues his leadership role with the new Onlife Health. He was originally appointed President of Gordian Health Solutions in 2008 and was promoted to CEO in 2009. He was part of the original team at BlueCross BlueShield of Tennessee (BCBST) that acquired Gordian in 2005, and he also served on Gordian’s Board of Directors from 2006 to 2008.

Prior to joining the Onlife Health team, Mr. Hunter served as Senior Vice President & Treasurer for BCBST. In that role, he had responsibility for corporate development, strategic planning, management reporting and the company’s $1+ billion investment portfolio. He led BCBST’s 2008 strategic investment in the TriZetto Group, a $1.4 billion leveraged buyout with Apax Partners and Regence BlueCross BlueShield.

Mr. Hunter joined BCBST in 2004 to launch the company’s corporate development department which included strategic investments and all merger and acquisition activity. Prior to joining BlueCross BlueShield of Tennessee, Mr. Hunter worked in investment banking, consulting and private equity where his responsibilities entailed extensive work with senior management teams and Boards of public and private companies.
